const QString &  src_signal,
QObject *  destobj,

bool Util::hasAccurateHWFrameCount (  ) 

True if the platform has a hardware framecount function.

true on platforms like linux that has the glXGetVideoSyncSGI function false on windows and platforms lacking this glX function

Definition at line 286 of file osdep.cpp.

Definition at line 106 of file Util.cpp.

unsigned Util::setCurrentThreadAffinityMask ( unsigned  cpu_mask  ) 

`Pins' the current thread to a particular set of processors, that is, makes it only run on a particular set of processors. returns 0 on error, or the previous mask on success.

Definition at line 485 of file osdep.cpp.
